title: Internet Archive

access_key_id.title: Access Key ID
access_key_id.description: IAS3 Access Key. Leave blank for anonymous access. Find it at https://archive.org/account/s3.php

secret_access_key.title: Secret Access Key
secret_access_key.description: IAS3 Secret Key (password). Leave blank for anonymous access

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: IAS3 Endpoint. Leave blank for default value

front_endpoint.title: Frontend Endpoint
front_endpoint.description: Host of InternetArchive Frontend. Leave blank for default value

item_metadata.title: Item Metadata
item_metadata.description: Metadata to be set on the IA item (format: key=value). The 'x-archive-meta-' prefix is added automatically

item_derive.title: Trigger Derive
item_derive.description: Whether to trigger derive on the IA item. If false, the item will not be derived by IA upon upload (useful for files already in displayable format)

disable_checksum.title: Disable Checksum
disable_checksum.description: Don't ask the server to test against MD5 checksum. Great for integrity but can cause long delays for large files

wait_archive.title: Wait Archive
wait_archive.description: Timeout for waiting for server's processing tasks (archive, book_op) to finish. 0 to disable waiting

$comment: Internet Archive supports rich metadata. Items are publicly accessible once uploaded
